control.name: checkEditAllowMenu
control.windowcaption: Allow Built-in Context Menu check box
control.description: This check box allows or prohibits the picture editor's built-in context menu.

control.name: comboBoxSizeMode
control.description: This combo box demonstrates the picture size modes supported by the PictureEdit control.

control.name: comboBoxPictureAlignment
control.description: This combo box lets you apply various alignments to the image.

control.name: ceAllowFocused
control.description: The AllowFocused property specifies whether a selection rectangle is drawn around the focused Picture Edit.

control.name: ceAllowScroll
control.description: Gets or sets whether end-users can scroll a displayed image via mouse drag. This feature requires the ShowScrollBars property set to 'true'.
